attributes.action: A temporary relaxation of lockdown regulations during Eid
attributes.additional_details: Because on Christmas, people were allowed to mix households and celebrate. We have spent the last 2 Eids in lockdown. We have followed the rules and would request for a day where we can celebrate with families that we haven’t able to meet due to following strict rules
attributes.background: To Ease the lockdown rules so we can celebrate Eid for a day and we want the rules to be relaxed on Eid day

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ease gathering restrictions on religious festivals and holy days
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576482
